content.name: Terran Tessak Corvette
content.description:
Terran Tessak Corvette
7.5 compatible
Not VRO compatible
Adds a new corvette to the game, the Tessak. The ship can be purchased from the Segaris Pioneers.
The ship has 5 weapon mounts, including one mount for a missile launcher. It can be equipped with two shield generators and two turrets.
content.author: SirFrancisDrake

text.name: Terran Tessak Corvette
text.description: Добавляет новый корвет Тессак. Корабль можно приобрести у Пионеров Сегариса.
